mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (mno, mname, mid, mpw, memail, maddr, maddr_detail, mpost_code, mphone, mbirthday) values (seq_member_mno.nextval, #{mname}, #{mid}, #{mpw}, #{memail}, #{maddr}, #{maddr_detail}, #{mpost_code}, #{mphone}, #{mbirthday})
mapper.update: update tbl_member set mname = #{mname}, mpw = #{mpw}, memail = #{memail}, maddr = #{maddr}, maddr_detail = #{maddr_detail}, mphone = #{mphone}, mbirthday = #{mbirthday} where mid = #{mid}
mapper.select: select mpoint from tbl_member where mid = #{mid}
select memail from tbl_member where mid = #{mid}
